name: Cruel Reality: A horrible dream
description:
The story is about fears and the past that can sit inside us, in our subconscious, and resurface at the most unusual moments.
Fear, friendship, hallucinations that mingle with reality...

  • An intriguing story with charismatic characters.
  • Inimitable and everyone's favorite retro atmosphere.
  • Unusual audio solutions will make you experience unforgettable emotions.
  • Several unique endings.

Stay tuned and join our discord channel!
